description:
Next Porto.Data meetup we will be dedicated to SQL Server Backups technology and we are happy to have a professional to talk about it.

Our invited speaker, Ricardo Linhares (https://www.linkedin.com/in/r-linhares/) counts with more than 20 years of experience in the health sector, and in the last three focused in the BI stack SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, PowerBI.

Agenda
• Welcome
• "SQL Backups - from basic to advanced." by
Ricardo Linhares
• Coffee break & networking
• Closing

After the event we invite everyone to join us for dinner.
name: Porto.Data #45 SQL Backups - from basic to advanced.
